mapper.insert: insert ignore into deal (trade_code, order_code, deal_price, deal_quantity, deal_amount, service_fee, deal_time,trade_pair_id) values (#{tradeCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dealPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{tradePairId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select trade_code, order_code, deal_price, deal_quantity, deal_amount, service_fee, deal_time,trade_pair_id from deal

SELECT t.trade_code AS trade_code, t.code AS code, t.order_code AS order_code, t.order_type AS order_type, t.trade_type AS trade_type, t.trade_fee AS trade_fee, t.deal_price AS deal_price, t.deal_quantity AS deal_quantity, t.base_currencyId AS base_currencyId, t.target_currencyId AS target_currencyId, t.created_time AS created_time, t.is_initiator AS is_initiator, t.trade_pair_id AS trade_pair_id FROM ( SELECT trade_code, code, order_code, order_type, trade_type, trade_fee, deal_price, deal_quantity, base_currencyId, target_currencyId, created_time, is_initiator, trade_pair_id FROM deal WHERE created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY `created_time` DESC ) t GROUP BY t.trade_pair_id
